about_the_game:
"Welcome to the OLD Future DEMO, a post-apocalyptic indie survival game set in a Sand-Box world inspired by classic dystopian games we all grew up with.

Early Access Content Status:

"Step into a world where a powerful civilization, fueled by the power of the ATOM, suddenly vanishes in a single afternoon. Explore the ruins, uncover the secrets, and unravel the mystery of their downfall in this post-apocalyptic adventure.

Embark on an epic adventure as you awaken in a desolate future. Search the ruins of a once-thriving world and discover hidden treasures among the debris. Navigate treacherous landscapes and unravel the mysteries of this long-forgotten era. Are you ready to claim your place among the legends of tomorrow?"


Friends, this is a Solo Dev project, all feedback is much appreciated!

Demo Features:
✔Inventory & gear
✔Crafting & Survival
✔Weapons, upgrades & various ammo.
✔Traders, beasts & AI
✔House building, upgrades & locks
✔Demo Version - Maps: Canyon
✔Multicamera & Minimap
✔Download size ~6 Gb
🎵Soundtrack: 83 Tracks v0.1.2.9🎵

*Please download the Full version for the full experience + Multiplayer
Thank you!
